title.narrative: New Urban Programme Analysis - Analysis for Selection of partner geographies

description.narrative: "The project involves conducting in-depth analysis for the selection of geographies (states and cities) that have the right political economy, reformist approach, demand for comprehensive Technical Assistance and market opportunities for potential investments. Key components which will be analysed include political economy, state of institutions, urban governance reforms, fiscal health, innovation and inclusion."

Expenditure is being reported as aggregate of payments made by PwC to third parties for goods and services procured for the project during FY 21 quarter 2 (1st July to 30th Sep 2020).
Exchange rate as on last day of the quarter has been used to convert value from INR to GBP. Exchange rates have been used from FBIL* website.
*Financial Benchmarks India Private Limited (FBIL) has taken over from RBI, the computation and dissemination of reference rate for spot USD/INR and exchange rate of other major currencies with effect from July 10, 2018.
